Description: Welcome to our very first episode of the Transformers Home-brewed DnD Podcast! Listen in as we follow Zephyr a new recruited Decepticon and Eight Wheeler a hired mercenary roll dice and go on their very first adventure!

Welcome to the second episode of the Transformers Home-brewed DnD Podcast! We noticed last weeks episode picked up some strange signal from an unknown source stay tune to see if we can discover who is behind these mysteries. Follow Zephyr & Eight Wheeler go on their next mission to the planet Antilla to find another special object!
